sen.j: 姉兼子が堀河天皇の乳母であったことから、康和2年（1100年）堀河天皇に仕え、翌康和3年（1101年）に典侍に任じられた。
sen.e: Because her elder sister Kaneko was the nurse of the Emperor Horikawa, she started to serve for the Emperor Horikawa in 1100 and was appointed to Naishi no suke (a court lady of the first rank) in 1101.

sen.j: 嘉承2年（1107年）7月に堀河天皇は崩御（死去）したが、翌天仁元年（1108年）から白河法皇の院宣をうけ鳥羽天皇に仕えた。
sen.e: After the Emperor Horikawa died in July 1107, she started to serve for the Emperor Toba from the following year 1108 by the command of the cloistered Emperor Shirakawa.

sen.j: しかし元永元年（1118年）秋ごろから、先帝の霊がとりついたと称してたびたび託言を行い、藤原璋子の妊娠、出産を予言したりした。
sen.e: From the autum of 1118, however, she often prophesyed something on the pretext of being possessed by the spirit of former Emperor, including the prophet concerning FUJIWARA no Shoshi's pregnancy and delivery.
